about_the_game:
Welcome to



A world where you can control Shido to explore beautiful places, have fun in different adventures and games and learn a little more about our history and the projects we are developing.

We want to build this world together, so we plan to implement new features periodically with community feedback. In addition, we are implementing small games that demonstrate the projects that we have already published and that we want to develop.

The game contains

  • The Shido to control/walk around
  • The main city
  • Different environments and scenarios to explore
  • Minigames
  • Objects and resources to interact
  • Stories and secrets to discover
  • Relaxing and immersive soundtrack
  • Free to play

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB available space
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 5770, 1 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
